welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sousse, Tunisia! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of this stunning coastal city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Habib Bourguiba Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zine El Abidine Ben Ali International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
